## 18. RIVER
### Definition
Most generic term for a stream of fresh water flowing in a channel above the ground, often ending in a lake or in the sea. Avoid terms specifically for smaller, e.g. "stream", or larger, e.g. Fr. "fleuve", rivers. (CoBL)

### Contexts
1. The river flows from the mountains into the sea. 2. There is a lot of fish in our river.
